sentences.sContent: the first flight across the Atlantic
sentences.sCn: 跨越大西洋的首次飞行

sentences.sContent: They ran straight across the road (=  without stopping  ) .
We’d got halfway across before Philip realized he’d left his money at home.
sentences.sCn: 我们走到半路，菲利普才意识到他把钱忘在家里了。
我们向山谷另一边凝望。

phrases.pCn: 全面地；包括一切地；以三等分的钱数赌同一匹马赢得前三名

trans.tranOther: from one side of something to the other
